<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Trigger a workflow run"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/workflows/{workflow_identifier}/runs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Start a new execution of a workflow with optional input parameters.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"workflow_identifier","description":"The unique identifier of the workflow to trigger.","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"inputs":{"default":{},"type":"object","description":"Input parameters to pass to the workflow execution.","additionalProperties":{}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
